room_title: Escape room "Left at Home" by The Quandary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: We did the "Left at Home" escape room and it was a blast! It was tough to escape but we managed with two minutes to spare. Great customer service and they even provided clues if we got stuck. I would highly recommend and we will be coming back.

room_title: Escape room "Left at Home" by The Quandary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Great escape room. It has lots of fun Easter egg references throughout adding to the overall experience. The puzzles were tough enough to give a thrill when they were solved yet still solvable. Really enjoyed the entire experience!

room_title: Escape room "Left at Home" by The Quandary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: This was our first time doing an escape room, and we loved it! We knew a Home Alone themed escape room would be a good time, but it definitely exceeded all of our expectations. We look forward to coming back for the escape the 90s room!
